footer.about: The aim of zwangerenportaal.nl is to provide pregnant women with optimal information about their own pregnancy.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefit: A year-long discount on products for you and your baby

appointment.view: View your appointments here at the midwife
appointment.title: What time is my appointment?

ratingSystem.title: Let us know! Was this valuable to you?

seeOffers.description: We together with more and more partners to take care of the best actions for you.

404.description: The requested page is unfortunately not found, we apologize for the inconvenience!

statusPage.help: We are happy to help you!

5xx.description: We're working on it and we'll get it fixed as soon as we can

statusPage.getInTouch: Send an email to info@zwangerenportaal.nl and let us know what you were looking for, then we will gladly solve it for you!

dailyInformation: You can find daily information here

profile.dailyInformation: Do you want useful daily information about your pregnancy?

dueDate.label: What is your due date?
dueDate.message: We have a few short questions to provide you with the best possible information, for example information about the week of pregnancy or help with finding care providers in your area.

partner.label: Email address of your partner
partner.placeholder: Email address partner for invitation pregnerenportaal.nl

message.text: Your partner also wants to know what is going to happen with the pregnancy and what awaits him or her! Therefore, Zwangerenportaal.nl also provides valuable information for your partner.
Leave the e-mail address of your partner below so that we can inform him or her.

postcode.label: What is your zip code (only first 4 digits)?

message.text: What is the reason that you have applied for zwangerenportaal.nl?

mailSubscription.label: Do you want to receive our Pregnancy Portal e-mail once a week?

message.text: With the weekly Pregnancy E-mail you will receive an e-mail every week in your inbox where you will find all relevant information regarding the pregnancy week in which you are. Super-active!
That saves you a lot of searching on the internet. This way you are always fully aware of your development and that of your baby.

appointments.notFound: No previous appointments have been found.
appointments.noScheduledAppointments: No scheduled appointments have been found.

organizations.readMore: read more about our practice here.

organisationView.title: Linde's Practices
organisationView.description: All your maternity care under one roof. Are you pregnant? Do you live in the Haarlem region, Heemstede? Then we offer you the most complete care, where you can choose how you want to organize your pregnancy care. With three different care packages and tailor-made solutions, we can pamper you throughout your pregnancy. Because tell yourself, you deserve it ?!
